short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Call, Text and Email Appointment Reminders from Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The AppointmentReminders.com Google Extension provides links and support for syncing your Google Calendar as well as providing a TAG creator to easily sync events.

Add the TAGs that you create with this extension to your calendar title or description.

You can easily link your Google Calendar to our appointment reminder service.

Once you set up the linking, everything is done through your Google Calendar.

Send Call, Text, or Email Appointment Reminders to your patients or customers using our automated reminder system.

Example #1 : The minimal amount of info we need!
<Mark Johnson 3031234567>
At a minimum, we need First Name+Last Name+Phone Number. It will add a customer named Mark Johnson into your customer list, set his Primary Phone Number as 3031234567, and send him your default reminder.

In addition, we can OPTIONALLY write back to your Google Calendar.
1. Write Customers Responses to Event Description: Will write your customer’s response back to your Google Calendar event Description
2. Change Event Color – Will change the color of your Google Calendar event based on the customers response to your reminder.
